title.message: Acceptable Ads have been turned off

reason-no-acceptable-ads.message: No ads are acceptable to me

reason-privacy.message: I'm concerned about my privacy when I allow some ads

reason-still-ads.message: I still see ads that annoy me

reason-unknown.message: I don't know what Acceptable Ads are

reasons-header.message: We want to make Adblock Plus even better. Please tell us why you turned off Acceptable Ads:

reason-other-placeholder.message: Please share with us your reason for turning off Acceptable Ads

error-msg.message: Please select at least one of the options above

disclaimer.message: By clicking Submit, you are sending your response to Adblock Plus. Please see our privacy policy.
